## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G12470](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G12470)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>RER4</u>
- **Gene Name:** RETICULATA-RELATED 4
- **Description:**   UvrABC system C protein, putative (DUF3411);(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:505006615
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
